※

Repetition compulsion

is a psychological phenomenon in which a person repeats a traumatic event or its circumstances over and over again… For example, one may choose to stay with a ‘normal’ pattern of pain and chaos instead of risking the perceived trauma of new experiences.

Come on and change the course of history
And pull us through
And pull us through
And this is the end
This is the end of the world

Muse - Apocalypse Please

※

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet

Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure… In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammelled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided… The wise man therefore always holds in these matters to this principle of selection: he rejects pleasures to secure other greater pleasures, or else he endures pains to avoid worse pains. Cicero

Wine Library TV

A very entertaining and informative video blog from which I’ve learned a lot about wine. This is a fantastic example of how to use technology and online community building to spread a message (in this case, selling wine).
